verses.verse: וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Again the word יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came [to me] saying
